author: Adam Vjestica
title: Morrisons: online delivery slots, click-and-collect, and opening hours today
description: Morrisons is doing its best to cope with the unprecedented demand for online deliveries.
content: Morrisons has been hit hard by the huge surge in online food delivery orders. The supermarket's website was down for a period of time, and now the company has implemented a strict queuing system that plainly says whether slots are available or not. If you nee… [+2474 chars]
